IDS-as-a-Service

Data service provider name: Digi-GO
Service name: IDS-as-a-Service
Service description: Retrieve basic IDS for building permits as defined in the DSGO adoption project ‘BIM building permits’
Contact point: Constantijn Molengraaf
Adherence: To be determined
Version: v0.1 / proof of concept
Conforms to: Building Smart IDS
Level of assurance: not applicable
Security level: not applicable
Acces rules: not applicable
Obligations and advice: This service is provided only for demonstration purposes within the DSGO program, all liabilities lay with the user. Availability of the service is not guaranteed.
Service level agreements: None
Costs: not applicable
Eori:
Service id: 0123456789
Service endpoint: https://dsgo-test-api-bimvergunningen-ids.azurewebsites.net/
Token endpoint: not applicable
Is public: Yes
Endpoint description: https://dsgo-test-api-bimvergunningen-ids.azurewebsites.net/docs
Language: nl-NL
Certificate subject name: not applicable
Capability endpoint: https://dsgo-test-api-bimvergunningen-ids.azurewebsites.net/capabilities
Tech contact point: Constantijn.molengraaf@digigo.nu
